Package UI

Class Save

java.lang.Object
UI.Save
public class Save extends Object
Class Save stores the output of all the different calculations to the, in the UI configured, output locations

  • Constructor Details

    • Save

      public Save(String path, String fileName, boolean hybrid, int run) throws IOException
      Constructor for the Save class to initialize all values.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to which the files should be stored
      fileName - The name given to the files stored.
      hybrid - Not in use at the moment
      run - The index of the current simulation run.
      Throws:
      IOException - When files cannot be stored this exception is thrown.

  • Method Details

    • saveStatistics

      public void saveStatistics(int counterAboveCarryingCapacity, int counterOffspring, boolean ATon) throws IOException
      Function to save the statistics of a run.
      Parameters:
      counterAboveCarryingCapacity - ?
      counterOffspring - ?
      ATon - Wether or not the Adaptive treatment is on.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception is thrown when file cannot be written.

    • saveSettings

      public void saveSettings(RuleSet rs, PopulationStatus ps) throws IOException
      Function to save the settings of the simultion using the ruleset and the status of the population.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ruleset configured for the simulation.
      ps - The population status for the simulation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception is thrown when file cannot be written.

    • saveStepNo

      public void saveStepNo(int step) throws IOException
      Function to save steps into plottedSteps.txt
      Parameters:
      step - The step in the simulation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception that is thrown if the file cannot be stored.

    • saveDistri

      public void saveDistri(double[][] distri, int total) throws IOException
      Function to save the distribution into the file Distribution.m
      Parameters:
      distri - Matrix of distribution.
      total - Total number of distributions.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception that is thrown if the file cannot be stored.

    • save

      public void save(SaveObject so) throws IOException
      Function to save the locations of the simulation into the Location.m file.
      Parameters:
      so - The Save object class that contains all the locations.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception that is thrown if the file cannot be stored.

    • writeHistory

      public void writeHistory() throws IOException
      Function to store the history of the simulation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception that is thrown if the file cannot be stored.

    • finish

      public void finish() throws IOException
      For all files generate a new line and close the file writer.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception that is thrown if the file cannot be stored.
